label: Moderation platform
description: A web app for content moderation. Converted designs from Figma to a React codebase. Spearheaded the base UI and components before turning it over.

label: Account management platform
description: A core system used for authentication and authorization of users to different services and platforms. Created the initial design, functionalities and back-end connection of the accounts management suite.

label: NMS Apps
description: A collection of interconnected applications and services. Provides User management, Platform Authentication/Authorization, Talent management, Human Resource, Financial tools and business platforms.
responsibility: Project Management, Co-lead, Code Review, Mentoring, Frontend, Backend

label: Finance Dashboard
description: Pieced together packages to create a dynamic dashboard with widgets like Analog/Digital global clock, Real-time foreign exchange, ForEx tools, Financial graphs and other tools to aid finance teams.

label: Foreign Exchange PDF Scraper
description: A Node.js app that scrapes, calculates and stores Foreign Exchange data from PDF's to generate 'real-time' and historical rates accessible by API

label: GEO Code API
description: Node.js API for Countries, States, Cities and Barangies (for the Philippines) accessible by API. Philippines geological data from the Philippines Statistics Authority. https://psa.gov.ph/classification/psgc/

label: Redis monitoring tool
description: A web app for viewing the health of a Redis instance. Let's developers view current memory consumption, actions, logs and other information about a redis database.

label: Mobile Chat Application
description: Re-worked a mobile chat app made from Cordova to React Native. Basically improved everything from supporting touch gestures, implementing in-app camera features and improving overall performance and user experience.
responsibility: Chat functionality, User Interface, Push Notification, App Management

label: Dodgy Skies
description: Be one of seven different characters able to dodge missiles while collecting stars, each in their own unique way. Level them up until they evolve for cooler looks and even more stars. Beat your own high score or challenge your friends and top the leaderboards now!
responsibility: Gameplay mechanics, User Interface, Ads, Monetization, App presence API, App Management

label: What Bread!
description: Join Tina Pie on her baking adventure through Silly Con Valley! Travel through shiny business parks and meet insanely accurate archetypes, while taking orders for and packing up your delectable pastries. But watch out: get the orders out as soon as possible or watch your dreams come crashing down!
responsibility: User Interface, Ads, Monetization, App presence API, App Management

label: Yurei Ninja
description: You: A ninja, back from the dead, seeking revenge againstâ€¦The Enemy: A samurai warlord with the blackest of hearts who turned against you! Trained in the art of hiding and surprise attacks, avoid traps, strike down enemies and destroy deadly bosses, all trying to stop your quest.
responsibility: User Interface, Ads, Monetization, App presence API, App Management
